snippet.title: Riverbond - Gameplay and Crossover Skins Trailer | PS4
snippet.description: Riverbond is a ‘shoot and slash’ featuring a charming voxel art style, up to 4 player couch co-op and crossover skins from beloved indie games. Coming to PlayStation Store this summer.
